nodes.text: Jento Svarthos was a male Human general during the time period known as the Cold War. In 3643 BBY, Jento was present in the Vaiken Spacedock, headquarters of the reconstituted Sith Empire's Imperial Fleet.

Jento Svarthos was added in the 2017 Update 5.6 following the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion. He has no interaction options and no dialogue. The character shares a name and exact appearance with the signal in-game character of Jason Kidwell, who died with cancer in 2015.
